Thanks to the 3,249 people who responded to our snapshot survey on school opening preferences. Several weeks ago we surveyed parents and staff directly by email. This snapshot survey was a quick check to see if sentiment has changed.

We used Facebook to reach a broad spectrum of parents, staff, and community members. It is only one of many data points. Board Members are also taking into consideration input directly from stakeholders. We are working hard to finalize our reopening plans as soon as possible.

Results:

• 39.3% of respondents selected "Return to 5-days a week in-person instruction K-12."
• 23.3% of respondents selected "Return to 100% remote learning."
• 21.9% of respondents selected "Return to a hybrid (2 days in/2 days remote) for all grades."
• 9.1% of respondents selected "Return to 5-days in-person K-8 and a hybrid in grades 9-12."
• 6.4% of respondents selected "Return to 5-days in-person K-5 and a hybrid in grades 6-12."
